title: Calories in a 7-Eleven Taquito
meta_description: Discover calories in a 7 11 taquito, including macros like protein and fat, plus tweaks and FAQs for quick nutrition insights.
assumptions: Standard 7-Eleven frozen breakfast taquito (e.g., bacon, egg, cheese; ~3.5 oz or 100g), microwaved, no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, preparation, and exact size. Check 7-Eleven packaging or app for precise values.

quick_answer.text: A 7-Eleven taquito typically contains ~250 kcal with 10 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a 7 11 taquito?
faqs.a: Approximately 250 kcal for a standard breakfast taquito.

faqs.q: What are the macros in a 7-Eleven taquito?
faqs.a: About 25 g carbs, 10 g protein, 12 g fat, and 600 mg sodium.

faqs.q: Does a 7 11 taquito have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 600 mg per taquito due to processing and cheese.
Typically pre-fried and frozen; microwaving adds minimal extra calories.

faqs.q: How do calories vary by 7 11 taquito flavor?
faqs.a: Bacon/egg ~250 kcal; bean/cheese lower at ~200 kcal; steak higher at ~280 kcal.
